channel.title: (DELTA)How to change the max hit of a monster?(DELTA)
channel.description: can someone please help me change max hits of monster (DELTA)

item.title: (DELTA)How to change the max hit of a monster?(DELTA)
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

} else {
if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
hitDiff = EnemyHP;
}
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 9)
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 386;
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3200)
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x326; // drags: chaos ele
// emote ( YESSS )
if ((npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1605)
|| (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1472)) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 386; // drags: abberant
// spector death ( YAY )
}

IM SO LOST OMFG +{
